alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 9:28PM CST until December 13 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 928 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rosefield, or 14 miles south of Columbia, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Enterprise around 935 PM CST. Jigger around 955 PM CST. Wisner around 1000 PM CST. Winnsboro around 1005 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
